attributes.action: Call a general election. Both Leavers and Remainers agree on this. Call one now
attributes.background: Leavers and Remainers spend most days disagreeing. There is one thing both sides can agree on. That is that we need a General Election now! Both sides agree the government is not fit to govern. Both sides agree we need change. So call an election and let us, the people, decide who we want in power.
